basic.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Bacillus subtillis ICTA-07 (MIC=22 µM), Microccocus luteus ATCC 4698 (MIC=43 µM), Enterococcus faecalis WHO14 (MIC=34 µM);Gram-negative bacteria:Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853 (MIC=77 µM), Yersinia enterocolitica ATCC 9610 (MIC=49 µM), Acinetobacter calcoaceticus ATCC 2305-5 (MIC=43 µM).
